scripts.build: tsc && chmod +x lib/bin.js && yarn pack -f package.tgz
scripts.docs:bin: mkdir docstemp ; (commanderdoc markdown lib/bin.js -o docstemp/__cli.md --cli-name "npx `jq -r .name package.json`") ;
scripts.docs:lib: typedoc --theme markdown --readme none --includeVersion --out docstemp src/ && rm README.md ; mv docstemp/README.md docstemp/_library.md
scripts.docs:compile: mkdir docstemp ; cp TOP.md docstemp/README.md ; concat-md docstemp > README.md && rm -rf docstemp
scripts.docs: rm -rf docstemp && yarn docs:lib && yarn docs:bin && yarn docs:compile
scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn build && yarn docs && git commit README.md -m "docs: updating docs" && git push
